analysis: The project is a static website with basic HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The current theme is Egyptian-themed, but the task requires adapting it for a Christmas mobile-responsive design. The existing files need to be analyzed to understand the current structure and identify areas for UI improvements.

improvements.description: Add CSS media queries to ensure the website is responsive on mobile devices, adjusting font sizes, margins, and padding for smaller screens.
Implement a Christmas-themed color palette with reds, greens, and golds to replace the current Egyptian-themed colors.
Update the HTML structure to include a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.
Add Christmas-themed decorations such as snowflakes, Christmas trees, and Santa Claus icons to the HTML structure.
Implement JavaScript functionality to toggle the mobile navigation menu when the hamburger icon is clicked.
Add interactive elements such as a Christmas countdown timer or animated snowflakes to enhance the festive experience.
